QuestData.Title: Get Us Some Beach
QuestData.Description:
These guys are running out of "ammo" faster than we can replace it!
I tells 'em, we're on a beach, you're in a sandblaster, suck it up!
They says it's against the cleaner driver rules for their local chapter.
I'm not buyin' it.
Grab us some more sand. Them sand monsters have gotta be full of the stuff!
We'll make it worth your time.
